1.SummaryEnglish: When his father is murdered, Sanshiro sets off to find the mysterious killer and bring him to justice. His only clue? A glass eye left at the scene of the crime

2.SummaryEnglish: People say they saw a one-eyed man in a town full of skyscrapers, but Sanshiro isn't the only one on a quest for vengeance in that city.

3.SummaryEnglish: Sanshiro happens upon a quiet border town that people claim is haunted. Little do they know that restless spirits are hardly the worst thing to fear in that desolate place.

4.SummaryEnglish: As bandits on horseback gallop across the desert, a young woman with an incredible secret crosses Sanshiro's path.

5.SummaryEnglish: Finding his father's killer goes one step forward, two steps back when chasing a lead results in a case of mistaken identity for Sanshiro.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Black Satans take what they want, when they want. Only Sanshiro stands between them and a young Jun's valuable medicine, intended to heal his precious sister, Yuri

7.TitleEnglish: The Tiger of the Sea: Harimau
7.SummaryEnglish: "Take this coin to the Liberty, and you'll meet one-eyed Heim." These cryptic words are Sanshiro's latest lead to a man who might just be his father's killer.

8.SummaryEnglish: The super-humanly strong Shadow Men easily defeat Sanshiro, but the true horror is what their creator intends to do to Sanshiro in the depths of his laboratory.

9.SummaryEnglish: Sanshiro stumbles upon a duel in the wilderness - and the man who walks away the victor has just one eye. Could this at long last be the man who killed his father?

10.SummaryEnglish: Take that path, young traveler, and you will find the castle of illusion - but who has called Sanshiro to this barren world of death?

11.SummaryEnglish: Sanshiro rescues a young woman from a rampaging rhinoceros, but that was easy. Returning her home and finding her missing brother will be the true challenge.

12.SummaryEnglish: The sun sets on a village of death. New graves line the streets. Crows cry out for the dark of night. Something horrible must have happened here - but what?

13.SummaryEnglish: Mistaken for a spy, Sanshiro is interrogated within the walls of an impregnable iron fortress. He must escape or see his quest for vengeance die with him.

14.SummaryEnglish: A detour leads Sanshiro into an investigation by the Secret Police. His reward for helping them? A shot at finding the one-eyed man.

15.SummaryEnglish: A businessman named Black has a proposal for Sanshiro. A long dog watches the house in solitude. But how are they connected, and is the dog driven by madness or revenge?

16.TitleEnglish: At the Bottom of the Sea
16.SummaryEnglish: Innocent children sing in a peaceful orphanage in France - but their voices only herald the shadow of an oncoming storm.

17.SummaryEnglish: Even the daredevils of the Hooligans' Squad pale in the face of the One-Eyed Demon General. As for Sanshiro? He'll charge right in with vengeance on his mind.

18.SummaryEnglish: In the dead of night, a black-clad figure rises from the grave. The ghost of the One-Eyed Admiral is after Helena, and Sanshiro is determined to save her.

19.SummaryEnglish: A chance encounter with a man on the run puts Sanshiro in the mob's cross-hairs. He must wager his life in the ultimate test of trust, but will Francis make the right call?

20.SummaryEnglish: A child seeks to kill a one-eyed tiger, and in him Sanshiro sees a reflection of himself. Reminded of his goals, Sanshiro will help Kamir become strong.

21.SummaryEnglish: With Kamir's life on the line, Sanshiro faces off against the man-eating white tiger.

22.SummaryEnglish: A remote mountain range hides many secrets, among them the rare and valuable Platonium X - and, perhaps, the one-eyed man whom Sanshiro seeks.

23.SummaryEnglish: Sanshiro has been accused of murdering his friend Millie's father. Can Kenbo clear Sanshiro's name in time to avoid a trip to the gallows?

24.TitleEnglish: Secret Technique: The Heaven and Earth Throw
24.SummaryEnglish: The circus-master knows a technique that could help Sanshiro defeat the one-eyed man and finally avenge his father. But can he master the technique in time to get his revenge?

25.SummaryEnglish: A terrifying devil slaughtered an entire village - and a bystander says he had only one eye. Could Sanshiro be hot on the trail of his father's killer?

26.TitleEnglish: The Beauty with the Hidden Blade
26.SummaryEnglish: Sanshiro meets a kindred spirit on the road to revenge. What will he see in this reflection of his spirit, and what new goals will emerge as a result?
